title: It's In Her Blood
description: This is a multi-layered plot that’s filled with suspense, action, drama, and a thread of romance woven in.When a video of Gail’s son was released on the internet displaying his inherent ability to recall information, her life was overturned, starting with her husband’s disappearance. She must face unsurmountable danger, taking lives and putting hers on the line to save him while dealing with emotional turmoil when she found out her loving husband was not as devoted as she thought and her enemies are more powerful and devious than she imagined.
author: S.S. Roswell
